short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for and copy gifs into the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you ever on social media, and there aren't gifs available? Meet Gifyer!

To use, just search for a gif, and click to copy. If you wish to match your browser theme, click darkmode! There are always new trending gifs on the home to save you a search.
